Adobe Photoshop CC 2019 v20.0.4.26077 Repack Portable x64 is not only a powerful image editing software, but also a versatile one. You can use it for various purposes and projects, such as photo retouching, graphic design, digital painting, web design, animation, and more. You can also work with different file formats, such as PSD, JPEG, PNG, GIF, TIFF, and more.
 
One of the best features of Adobe Photoshop CC 2019 v20.0.4.26077 Repack Portable x64 is the Content-Aware Fill tool. This tool allows you to remove unwanted objects or areas from your images and fill them with content that matches the surrounding pixels. For example, you can remove a person, a car, a sign, or anything else from your photo and make it look like it was never there. You can also use this tool to extend or duplicate parts of your image.
 
To use the Content-Aware Fill tool, you need to follow these simple steps:
 
1. Select the object or area that you want to remove with any selection tool, such as the Lasso tool or the Quick Selection tool.
2. Go to Edit > Content-Aware Fill or press Shift + Backspace on your keyboard.
3. A new window will open where you can see a preview of the result and adjust some settings, such as the sampling area, the fill settings, and the output settings.
4. When you are satisfied with the result, click OK to apply the changes to your image.

You can also use the Content-Aware Fill tool in different modes, such as Rectangular, Auto, Custom, or Elliptical. You can also use it on multiple layers or masks. You can learn more about the Content-Aware Fill tool and its options from the Adobe Help Center.
